name: ClearCryptos
description: ClearCryptos first protocol is a decentralized exchange (DEX) with an aggregated solution that will search for the best pathway for the user to swap crypto giving the user the best rates possible while also showing the user alternate routes. ClearCryptos operates as the first ever fiat on-ramp for Decentralized exchanges giving people the option to purchase crypto without having to go through centralized exchanges. In addition, ClearCryptos also provides the most unique analytics tools while also providing a state of the art trading platform where users can create and upload scripts to provide the optimal user experience.
